patthana14.5:4.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:4.2: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:4.3: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.5:5.1: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:5.2: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:5.3: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.5:6.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:6.2: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu dhammo ca uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.5:6.3: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
